snippet: Lance Armstrong admits to Oprah Winfrey that he had used performance-enhancing drugs in what could be a breakthrough moment for Ms. Winfrey's struggling network, the Tribune Company gets a new leader, and Dennis Kucinich makes his debut as a...
abstract: Lance Armstrong admits to Oprah Winfrey that he had used performance-enhancing drugs in what could be a breakthrough moment for Ms. Winfrey's struggling network, the Tribune Company gets a new leader, and Dennis Kucinich makes his debut as a contributor to Fox News.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Armstrong Comes Clean, and Kucinich Enters the "Fox Lair"
